Languages.string: one language of its creator's choice

MonsterTrait.Name: Illumination
MonsterTrait.Text: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

MonsterTrait.Name: Water Susceptibility
MonsterTrait.Text: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in water, it takes 2 (1d4) cold damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The myrmidon makes three scimitar attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Scimitar
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Fiery Strikes (Recharge 6)
MonsterAction.Text: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) fire damage.
